name: The Darkness (itch) (J.C.)
description:
An ancient evil has descended upon your peaceful country, and it's been over a week since the last dawn you saw. So gather your equipment, and head alone into the stormy night. Destroy The Darkness that awaits for you under the old graveyard, or the light will be gone forever.

Use the arrow keys to move around, Ctrl to fire the crossbow and Shift to swing you sword.

Game Credits

Artwork

Floating Head Monster sprites by Stephen Challener (Redshrike)
http://opengameart.org/content/bosses-and-monsters...

Dragon sprites by Redshrike, Surt and Scribe
http://opengameart.org/content/dragon-idle-animati...

Anglerman monster sprites by Stephen "Redshrike" Challener (Sprites), 5hiroi (concepts) and Heather Lee Harvey (concept)
http://opengameart.org/content/3-rpg-enemy-remixes

Forest tiles by Stephen Challener and the Open Surge team
(http://opensnc.sourceforge.net)
http://opengameart.org/content/32x32-and-16x16-rpg...

House tiles by MrBeast
http://opengameart.org/content/house-tileset-black...

House tiles by Lanea Zimmerman (Sharm)
http://opengameart.org/content/lpc-house-insides

NPC Model by Johannes Sjölund
http://opengameart.org/content/character-animation...

Player Model by Gaurav Munjal
http://opengameart.org/content/universal-lpc-sprit...

Forest, temple and village tiles by DENZI
http://www3.wind.ne.jp/DENZI/diary/
Also available at http://opengameart.org/content/denzis-32x32-orthog...

Forest tiles by Hyptosis
http://opengameart.org/content/lots-of-hyptosis-ti...

Zombies by Reemax, original art done by Artisticdude
http://opengameart.org/content/zombie-and-skeleton...
